DOC.brief_title: Randomized Placebo-controlled Pilot Trial Prebiotics+Glutamine HIV Infection
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize placebo-controlled clinical trial evaluate safety effectiveness modify gut microbiota , bacterial translocation , immune activation marker endothelial dysfunction dietary supplement ( prebiotics + glutamine ) period six week . The study enroll four cohort : 1 ) HIV-infected , treatment naive individual ; 2 ) HIV-infected subject , currently ART , > 350 CD4+ T-cells/uL ; 3 ) HIV-infected subject , currently ART , < 350 CD4+ T-cells/uL ; 4 ) HIV negative healthy control .
